engine.welcome: Welcome to BeamNG.drive in US English :)
engine.cef.subprocessdied.title: Unresponsive UI Process
engine.cef.subprocessdied.msg:
The UI Process failed to respond in time.
This can happen if an Antivirus blocks the BeamNG.drive.ui.exe application.

You can eventually get more help there:

http://wiki.beamng.com/Errors/Unresponsive_UI_Process

Do you want to open that address in your browser now?

ui.modWizard.skinWizard.intro: Welcome to the skin creation wizard. The following steps will give you an overview on how to make a skin for any of the official BeamNG.Drive vehicles.
ui.modWizard.skinWizard.skinName: Please choose a name for your skin
ui.modWizard.skinWizard.editFile: To edit the skin simple open the .dds file in a compatible .dds editor such as Paint.Net.
ui.modWizard.skinWizard.editSkin: Once you have opened the folder you can begin creating your skin. Simply paint whatever you wish over the white sections and then save your skin. After clicking next your created skin will be loaded into the game and you will be able to edit it in realtime.
ui.mainmenu.onlineFeatures.featureDescri: You can choose to enable or disable all online functions in BeamNG.drive. This will affect:[br][list][*]In-game repository[*]Mod subscriptions[*]Achievements[*]Leaderboards[*]Chat features[*]Content sharing features[/list]By enabling the online features you agree to our [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/Privacy_Policy]Privacy Policy[/url] and our [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/TOS]Terms of Service[/url].[br][br]You can change this setting anytime in Options > Gameplay.

ui.options.communityTranslationsAckText: Translations are created by the users of the community. BeamNG is not responsible for the translations in any way (i.e. inappropriate or incorrect). Use at your own risk.
ui.options.userInterface.showCustomVehic: Show custom vehicles in vehicle selector
ui.options.gameplay.absBehavior.tooltip: Sets how the cars' ABS system works. Applies after spawning a fresh car.
ui.options.gameplay.escBehavior.tooltip: Sets how the cars' ESC system works. Applies after spawning a fresh car.
ui.options.gameplay.defaultGearboxBehavi: Sets the default gearbox behavior. Applies after spawning a fresh car.
ui.options.gameplay.autoClutch.tooltip: If enabled, the clutch is automatically controlled in realistic mode. Launches cars nicely, prevents stalling and makes sure to not break gears when shifting.
ui.options.gameplay.autoThrottle.tooltip: If enabled, manual transmissions cut the throttle on up-shifting and use rev-matching where required.
ui.options.gameplay.gearboxSafety.toolti: If enabled, gearboxes will deny shifts that might cause damage as well as prevent certain mode changes for a more immersive racing experience. (For example shifting out of M mode is disallowed until you are below a certain speed)
ui.options.gameplay.traffic.tooltip: Requires manually spawning the desired vehicles
ui.options.gameplay.controlOnBlur: Allow controller input and force feedback when window focus is lost
ui.options.camera.transitionHint: How long the animation on switching cameras will take in milliseconds
ui.options.camera.fovHint: Allows you to change the Field of View. Adds to the vehicle's settings
ui.options.camera.dynamicFovHint: Greater field of view angles are applied at speed
ui.options.camera.fineAdjustHint: Click and use the cursor keys for fine adjustments
ui.options.camera.cameraTVSpeedTooltip: Does not force one fixed speed, rather it acts as a modifier over the dynamically chosen speed
ui.options.graphics.restartRequired: A game restart is required for this to take effect
ui.options.graphics.uimaxresExplanation: Specifies maximum resolution for the User interface. Useful for 4k screens.
ui.options.graphics.uimaxresNotAvailable: UI Maximum Resolution is not available in the main menu
ui.options.graphics.GraphicDynReflection: Note - Faces per update can be very graphically intensive. If you experience performance issues, consider lowering this
ui.controls.rmAllUserModification: Remove all user-made modifications (leaving the factory bindings, provided only for the most common peripherals)
ui.controls.driverWarning: Warning: if you are having troubles with the force feedback of your {{productName}}, you might have to update to the most recent Logitech drivers version.
ui.controls.hint1: Hint: always install the latest drivers and disable "combined pedals" in Windows Control Panel (if available)
ui.controls.hint2: Hint: you can also assign the mouse to 'steering' (or any other action) in the 'Bindings' menu
ui.controls.usePhoneOrTablet: Use your phone or tablet to drive!
ui.controls.firewallError: The game seems to be blocked by the Windows Firewall.
ui.controls.iosQRCode: Scan the QR code below or click the button for the IOS app.
ui.controls.androidQRCode: Scan the QR code below or click the button for the Android app.
ui.debug.effects.msg.fovOnlyInFreeMode: The FOV only works in free camera mode
ui.faq.getSupport.a: You can get help in our forums: [url=http://www.beamng.com/forums/]beamng.com/forums[/url]. Or you can contact us directly via: [url=http://support.beamng.com/]support.beamng.com[/url] or via email: [h1]support@beamng.com[/h1] [br] We will try to get back to you as soon as possible, but please allow two working days.
ui.faq.changeCamera.q: How do I change the camera?
ui.faq.changeCamera.a: Press [action=switch_camera_next] to cycle vehicle cameras, or [action=toggleCamera] to use the free camera.
ui.faq.changeVehicle.a: You can use the vehicle selector from the dashboard using [action=toggleMenues] or press [action=vehicle_selector].
ui.faq.spawnVehicle.q: How do I spawn more vehicles?
ui.faq.spawnVehicle.a: You can use the vehicle selector from the dashboard using [action=toggleMenues] or press [action=vehicle_selector].
ui.faq.mapEditor.q: How do I open the map editor?
ui.faq.mapEditor.a: The map editor can be accessed by pressing [action=toggleEditor] when running in windowed mode
ui.faq.useMods.a: After installing a mod, you can find the mod in the vehicle or level selection menu.
ui.faq.updateGame.q: How do I update the game?
ui.faq.updateGame.a: Steam automatically installs updates when you are connected to the internet.[br] For more information, visit our wiki page [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/Updating_the_game]http://wiki.beamng.com/Updating_the_game[/url]
ui.faq.findMods.a: You can download mods from the repository: [url=http://www.beamng.com/resources/]BeamNG.drive repository[/url] If you are logged in simply click the green Install Mod button on the mods' page.
ui.faq.installMods.a: Download the .zip of the vehicle or level you wish to install. Drop the zip in [h1]My Documents\BeamNG.drive\mods[/h1]Do not unpack it. For more information and further instructions please [url=http://www.beamng.com/threads/guide-to-mod-installation.12872/]visit our wiki here[/url]
ui.performance.ram.wipNote: Memory might be off, this is WIP
ui.performance.benchmark.isRunningNote: Please wait: The benchmark is running.[br]This will take a minute.
ui.performance.benchmark.notavailable: The benchmark can only be run from the main menu.
ui.performance.laptopGPU: Using the dedicated graphics on laptops
ui.performance.laptopGPU.controlPanel: Go to the NVIDIA Control Panel
ui.performance.laptopGPU.customize: Customize BeamNG.drive to use 'High-performance NVIDIA processor'
ui.performance.laptopGPU.more: For more detailed information please check out our [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/Dedicated_Graphics]Wiki Guide[/url] or please contact our Support
ui.performance.warnings.oldwin7: Not running 64 Bit version: OS is older than Win7 Service Pack 1: Please update windows
ui.performance.warnings.missing64binary: Not running 64 Bit version: 64 Bit version missing: Please reinstall
ui.performance.warnings.toolessmemoryfor: Not running 64 Bit version: System has 4 GB of memory or less
ui.performance.warnings.thirdpartysoftwa: Not running 64 Bit version: Lavasoft software detected. More informations & solution here: [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/Lavasoft]wiki.beamng.com/Lavasoft[/url]
ui.performance.warnings.xinput: XInput (used for gamepads) is not available, please reinstall DirectX 9: [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/DirectXInstallation]wiki.beamng.com/DirectXInstallation[/url]
ui.performance.warnings.dinput: Direct Input (used for steering wheels) is not available, please reinstall DirectX 9: [url=http://wiki.beamng.com/DirectXInstallation]wiki.beamng.com/DirectXInstallation[/url]
ui.performance.warnings.minmem: Less than 4GB of memory: Not enough system memory to load some levels
ui.performance.warnings.memused: Over 80% of your system memory is used up. Consider closing applications or reboot.
ui.performance.warnings.freememlow: Below 2 GB of free physical memory. Consider closing applications or reboot.
ui.performance.warnings.cpuonecore: This game will not run well on only one physical core
ui.performance.warnings.intelgpu: You are using an Intel GPU. Make sure your dedicated GPU is used instead.
ui.performance.warnings.geforcemin: At least a GeForce 550 is required
ui.performance.warnings.amdhd: At least a AMD Radeon HD XXX is recommended
ui.performance.warnings.amdradeon: At least an AMD Radeon R8 is required
ui.performance.warnings.gpulowmem: Your GPU has less than 512 of video memory
ui.performance.warnings.os32bits: You have a 64 Bit CPU but only a 32 Bit Operating system
ui.performance.warnings.oswin8: Windows 8 recommended: running in x86 compatibility mode right now
ui.performance.warnings.app32: 64 bit version of the game recommended: running in x86 compatibility mode right now
ui.hints.quickSteerResponse: For quicker steering response, try different filters for the [action=steer_left] and [action=steer_right] bindings.
ui.hints.raceBrakesEffectiveness: Race brakes will lose effectiveness when they are too cold.
ui.hints.quickCameraMovement: Hold [action=movefast] for quicker camera movement (not supported by all cameras).
ui.hints.grabVehicleParts: You can grab parts of the vehicle by holding [action=nodegrabberRender] and then dragging with your mouse.
ui.hints.funStabilityControl: Cars with stability control can switch to more dangerous (but fun) modes using [action=toggleESCMode].
ui.hints.recoverVehicle: If your vehicle gets stuck, press [action=recover_vehicle] to recover it.
ui.hints.oldCarsBurn: Some old cars are prone to catching fire after a crash, but modern cars are much safer.
ui.hints.smokingWheels: If smoke comes out of the wheel wells, it's likely that the brakes have overheated.
ui.hints.carsBurnFuel: Your car may run out of fuel after very long runs. Watch the fuel gauge!
ui.hints.delicateCars: Some cars are not designed to be driven hard. Keep an eye on the temperature gauge!
ui.hints.stabilityControlPresent: Stability control is only present in the most modern vehicles. Older cars will be harder to control at the limit.
ui.hints.absWasOptional: Anti-lock brakes haven't always been mandatory. Older cars require more careful braking techniques to keep them under control.
ui.hints.engineBrakeForDownhill: Use engine braking when driving downhill in loaded trucks. Otherwise, their brakes may give out.
ui.hints.installRollCage: You can install roll cages in some vehicles: not only is it safer, but it improves chassis stiffness and car handling (use [action=parts_selector]).
ui.hints.spatialNavigation: You can navigate the menu using a game controller [action=menu_item_left] [action=menu_item_up] [action=menu_item_right] [action=menu_item_down] [action=menu_item_select].
ui.hints.slowMotionPhysics: Admire the physics in slow motion using [action=slow_motion] and [action=faster_motion].
ui.hints.removeRearSeats: Make your vehicle faster by removing unnecessary weight such as the rear seats, using the Parts Selector [action=parts_selector].
ui.hints.tuning: You can tweak tire pressure, alignment, and other settings in the "Tuning" menu [action=parts_selector].
ui.hints.customLicensePlate: You can customize the license plate text in the Parts Selector [action=parts_selector].
ui.hints.driveAtNight: You can drive at night by changing the settings in the "Environment" menu.
ui.hints.moonGravity: You can simulate moon gravity in the "Environment" menu.
ui.hints.unlockExtraFunctionality: Unlock extra functionality by enabling the 'Options' > 'Gameplay' > 'Advanced Functions' checkbox.
ui.hints.playMultiseat: Plug in several controllers and play with your friends at home, by opening any of the Multiseat scenarios.
ui.hints.increaseGroundClearance: Increase the ride height of your off-road vehicle if you are having trouble crossing a river.
ui.hints.tiresBurstOnBumps: Not all tires are designed for high speeds and loads. Some will burst when hitting bumps too fast.
ui.hints.blueSmokeIsPistonDamage: If you see blue smoke coming out of the exhaust, oil is being burnt, indicating piston ring damage.
ui.hints.keepTheEngineUpright: Operating an engine upside down causes oil starvation. Blue exhaust smoke will occur from oil submerging the cylinders, and the engine bearings could fail.
ui.hints.thermalDebugApp: To learn more about the engine simulation, you can add the "Engine Thermal Debug" app to the UI.
ui.hints.rollPitchApps: If you like crawling through rocks, the "Roll" and "Pitch" UI apps may be useful.
ui.hints.cruiseControlApp: For long, relaxed trips on the highway you can add the "Cruise Control" UI app. It works for all cars!
ui.hints.driveTheCanon: Did you know you can drive (and fire!) a cannon? Filter by "Prop" Type in the Vehicle selector [action=vehicle_selector].
ui.hints.vehicleSkins: Some vehicles have alternate skins. You can find them in the Parts Selector [action=parts_selector], under Paint Design.
ui.hints.toggleMods: You can quickly disable and enable all mods by clicking "Active All"/"None" in the Mod Manager.
ui.hints.importveFramerate: To improve your framerate, check the tips listed under Help > Performance > Basic Performance Improvements
ui.hints.photoModeMenu: The Photo Mode menu provides advanced control over the camera and an option for direct image upload to BeamNG servers.
ui.hints.publishScreenshots: If you like shooting photos of your ride, you can use [action=hide_ui] to hide the UI and then [action=publishScreenShot] to upload the image.
ui.hints.towTrailer: To tow a trailer with your truck: spawn both with [action=vehicle_selector], approach the trailer, and press [action=couplersToggle]
ui.hints.brakesAndSteeringVary: Each vehicle has different braking and cornering abilities. Get to know them before driving at the limit.
ui.hints.countersteerEarly: If a vehicle starts fishtailing from side to side, you need to countersteer earlier and faster. Using a steering wheel (or gamepad) is highly recommended.
ui.hints.startSlow: It's easy to run wide in corners when driving a car for the first time. Start slow, and drive faster as you get to know how each car handles.
ui.hints.parkingbrakeForTurning: Use the parking brake [action=parkingbrake] as a quick and dangerous way to turn around.
ui.hints.carefulWithOldSportsCars: Old sports cars without electronic aids can be difficult to control and require gentle application of the throttle.
ui.hints.corneringWithKeyboard: When cornering with a keyboard, repeatedly tap [action=steer_left] or [action=steer_right] to better control the steering angle and prevent unwanted understeer.
ui.hints.adaptToBadRoads: Old roads with bumps, tarmac patches and surface unevenness will limit cornering speed. You'll need to adapt your speed according to road conditions.
ui.hints.notAllCarsCanRace: Many vehicles are not suited for spirited driving or racing in stock form. Aftermarket upgrades are available in the Parts Selector [action=parts_selector].
ui.hints.changeBrakePads: If you experience brake fade, you can fit better brake pads in the Parts Selector [action=parts_selector].
ui.hints.useTurnSignals: Did you know most vehicles have working turn signals? This is also true in BeamNG.drive! Use [action=toggle_left_signal] and [action=toggle_right_signal] to activate them.
ui.hints.showCustomVehicles: To show your own custom car configurations in the vehicle selector, enable Options > Gameplay > Show Custom Vehicles.
ui.hints.tweakFOV: The camera field of view can be tweaked in Options > Gameplay > FOV Tune.
ui.hints.driveWithMouse: You can drive using your mouse too. Just go to the Controls menu and assign new bindings to your taste.
ui.hints.liftOffOversteer: Suddenly lifting the throttle in a high speed corner can unsettle the vehicle and lead to a loss of control. This is called "lift-off" oversteer.
ui.hints.snapOversteer: Cars with more weight on the rear wheels can have a tendency to initially understeer with throttle application, and then oversteer suddenly. This is called "snap" oversteer.
ui.hints.slideBackWithParkingBrake: You can slide the back of nose-heavy front-wheel drive vehicles easily with the parking brake, especially on loose surfaces.
ui.hints.customizeSpecializedBindings: You can customize vehicle-specific bindings (used in car crusher, cannon, etc) by clicking them on the top-right corner of the screen.
ui.hints.toggleFogLights: If your vehicle is equipped with fog lights, you can toggle them using [action=toggle_foglights].
ui.hints.toggleLightBars: Light bars in emergency vehicles can be toggled with [action=toggle_lightbar_signal].
ui.hints.TrackIRSupported: BeamNG.drive supports the TrackIR head tracking device; just plug it in and launch the game!
ui.hints.chooseDefaultVehicle: You can choose and customize the default vehicle: just head to the Garage!
ui.hints.chooseShiftingMode: To change the default shifting mode, go to Options > Gameplay
ui.hints.saveRestoreVehicleHome: You can save the vehicle home with [action=saveHome] and later restore it with [action=loadHome]
ui.radialmenu2.ai.chase.desc: AI will chase you and try to stop you.
ui.radialmenu2.ai.flee.desc: AI will try to evade you.
ui.radialmenu2.ai.random.desc: AI will follow all possible paths randomly.
ui.radialmenu2.couplers.toggle.desc: Toggle the coupler between the on/off state.
ui.radialmenu2.electrics.headlights.desc: Controls to toggle different headlight options.
ui.radialmenu2.ESC.desc: Controls for the different ESC modes.
ui.radialmenu2.funstuff.Break.desc: Break all components on the vehicle.
ui.radialmenu2.funstuff.Extinguish.desc: Extinguish any fires on the vehicle.
ui.radialmenu2.Save.desc: Save vehicle in its current form.
ui.garage.tune.name: Name
ui.garage.save.overwrite: Name used by another car. Overwrite?
ui.garage.load.emptyHint: Configure and save your own cars to have them listed here
ui.camera.freecam: Free camera: [action=movefast] to boost speed, [action=changeCameraSpeed] to tweak speed
replay.stopRecording: Replay saved (use replay UI app to view)
replay.playError: Cannot play file "{{filename.replace("replays/", "")}}". Check the log file for details
scenarios.cliff.get_down.title: Get Down
scenarios.cliff.get_down.description: Try to control the descent of your Gavril D15 and reach the beach checkpoint. Or, just hurtle off the cliff and hope for the best.
scenarios.derby.concrete_derby.title: Demolition Derby - Concrete Arena
scenarios.derby.concrete_derby.descripti: Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.derby.variedground_derby.title: Demolition Derby - Varied Ground Arena
scenarios.derby.variedground_derby.descr: Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.derby.regular_derby.title: Demolition Derby - Regular Arena
scenarios.derby.regular_derby.descriptio: Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.derby.fourway_derby.title: Demolition Derby - The Pit
scenarios.derby.fourway_derby.descriptio: Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.derby.mudpit_derby.title: Demolition Derby - Mud Pit Arena
scenarios.derby.mudpit_derby.description: Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.derby.derby_test.title: Demolition Derby - Test Internal
scenarios.derby.derby_test.description: Template scenario, not in public versions. Last car moving wins. Wreck your friends' cars while taking care of your own!
scenarios.driver_training.driver_trainin: Training 1: Acceleration and Braking

Welcome to the ETK Driver Experience Center. My name is Mike, and I'll be your instructor for this course. [br][br]Let's start out nice and easy - all you have to do is accelerate, and then stop before you hit the barriers. Make sure you brake when you reach the stop signs!
So you can drive like a pro in a straight line? Let's see how you do in the corners...
Too slow! You'll actually have to use your accelerator pedal for this test.
You missed the brake area
where are you going? The test area is in the other direction!
That'll buff out. Give it another try and please be more careful!
Training 2: Cornering
In the unlikely event that the road is not straight, you may need to stop accelerating and use your car's steering wheel. [br][br]Try it here on the roundabout, but watch out for the slippery area.
Nice turn. It's time to get you onto a proper road now.
I want to see you drive faster than that.
Looks like you might be running wide on the turn. Take it slower if you need to.
Staying off the grass would be a good start.
Training 3: Tight Road Course
So you've mastered the art of turning left, but can you navigate a narrow road? ETK has lent us one of their test cars - please take care of it.
You finished the course... although I wouldn't exactly call the ETK 800 a challenge to drive.
If you're going to travel that slow, I don't think a car is even necessary.
You hit a marker - I put them there to stop you cutting corners, you know.
Ouch, I'm not sure ETK's going to be lending us any more cars.
Training 4: Lane Changing
Changing lanes at highway speeds requires a gentle hand on the steering wheel. Do you have what it takes to control an 80s supercar?
Well done! The Civetta Bolide can be a tricky car for beginners.
You're supposed to be driving at highway speeds, aren't you?
I see a cone knocked over... that means you went outside the track!
Our insurance isn't going to be happy about this.
Training 5: Corner Speeds
You can't take just any corner at any speed: stick to the speed limits on the signs to guarantee your success.
Good job! I see you've grasped the concept of managing speed while cornering.
Looks like you're driving a lot slower than what your car is capable of.
You hit a cone. Try to stay inside the rumble strips.
Cars tend to corner worse after they've been smashed against walls.
Training 6: Easy Circuit
I've set up a circuit for you to practice what you've learned. Should be pretty easy: 2 laps, no surprises.
Well done! You've passed the basic component of this course. Now we can move on to some more advanced driving techniques.
That's a bit too slow - don't be afraid to push the car more!
There's only one cone on this entire track, and you managed to hit it.
This car is going to need some serious repair work.
Training 7: Hairpins
How do you turn the car around quickly in a tiny space? Pull the handbrake to slide round a hairpin, just like in the movies.
I've got to admit, that looked pretty cool.
Time's up! You'll have to finish quicker than that.
You didn't quite make that turn cleanly - I see you've bumped an obstacle.
Er, do we need to go back to lesson one?
Safety Training 8: Slalom
A slalom course is a hard thing to master. Get a feel for the weight of the car as you weave between the cones
Well done! You dodged those cones like a pro.
Too slow! A slalom course is only challenging at speed.
You bumped a cone back there, have another try.
Guess I should have set the barriers up further away!
Training 9: Rear-wheel Drive Handling
The Bruckell Moonhawk handles like a boat, so if you can finish a lap of this circuit first try, you're doing better than most of my students.
Great job! You are really getting the hang of this.
Watch those cones! Remember this car doesn't quite handle as well as some of the others you've driven.
This car has a V8 engine with plenty of power... use it!
This car is definitely going to need some work done before it's drivable again.
Training 10: Advanced Cornering
You made that last course look too easy, so I've set up a circuit with 4 of the most difficult turns I could think of. Good luck, you're going to need it!
I'm amazed you did it! Now let's finish off this training course with something fun.
Not fast enough - I know you can do better than that.
You hit a cone - if you're skidding off the track, try reducing your speed on corner entry.
Nasty crash there, you OK? Looks like the car's out of action.
Training 11: Drifting

We'll wrap things up with a short drift session. You will need to use a manual transmission for this test - stay in second gear for best drifting results. [br][br]Slide the car sideways to score as many points as you can within the 60 second time limit.[br][br]Use [action=shiftUp] and [action=shiftDown] to shift gears.
Great job! You painted that skidpad with rubber!
You call that drifting? Give it more speed and angle! Your Score: {{score}}
Great job! You painted that skidpad with rubber! Your Score: {{score}}
scenarios.east_coast_usa.gm_racetest.des: A short series of small jumps
scenarios.east_coast_usa.tanker_delivery: Deliver a tanker trailer with your Gavril T75 to the garage on the other side of town.
Back up slowly and couple the trailer
scenarios.east_coast_usa.police_patrol.d: Stop the speeding Hirochi SBR4 with your much slower Gavril Roamer Sheriff Edition.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.hidden_jump_a.d: Master a hidden jump through the trees in a Gavril Roamer. Careful control of speed and placement is required to survive the jump and make it to the checkpoint.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.jump_course_a.d: Drive the Bruckell Moonhawk in a time trial... with jumps! Try to get a fast time, but avoid destroying the car completely.
Use your Gavril T75 to deliver a valuable classic supercar to a house in the town. Whatever you do, don't damage the car.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.east_coast_chas: A wanted suspect has been spotted driving near the sawmill in a black Gavril Barstow. Go catch him!
scenarios.east_coast_usa.deliverytruck_t: Stop the fleeing delivery truck in your Gavril Grand Marshal police car!
You got too far away from the suspect
scenarios.east_coast_usa.pessima_test.de: A fun time trial to introduce the 1996 Ibishu Pessima.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.destroy_the_car: Destroy the Bruckell Moonhawk, no matter what it takes.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.minimum_speed.d: Use your old and broken Gavril T75 to deliver some concrete for the very last time.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.bank_robbery.de: You got a report about a bank robbery in your local town. Respond to the report and stop the fleeing suspect before he reaches his hideout.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.intro_road_race: A race through the countryside on east coast of the United States.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.offroad_ds_cour: Narrow bumpy track progressing in difficulty.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.town_course_sho: Another short rally sprint around the town.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.east_coast_chas: Catch the Bruckell Moonhawk in your much older Burnside Special police car.
Chase a tuned Bruckell LeGran with your turbocharged Ibishu 200BX police car.
BeamCom still hasn't fixed the internet at the police station. No more waiting on hold, it's time to convince them in person. Stop the van.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.high_speed_high: Blast through the rural highways in a twin turbo monster.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.rallycross_nd_l: A Rallycross course with a mix of asphalt and dirty roads.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.town_course_sho: A short rally sprint around the town.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.intro_road_race: A race through the countryside on east coast of the United States.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.car_delivery.de: You've got an expensive sports car loaded up on your Gavril T75, take it to the new owner in the countryside.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.dirt_hopper.des: A short dirt time trial to introduce the Ibishu Hopper.
scenarios.gridmap.slalom.title: Slalom Trial
scenarios.gridmap.slalom.description: Weave back and forth between the blocks in an Ibishu Covet. Keep the speed steady and manage the cars balance with steering and throttle.
scenarios.gridmap.corridor.title: Corridor
scenarios.gridmap.corridor.description: A truck is heading your way, and your little Ibishu Pigeon is trapped in a small corridor. Find a way to survive!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_racetest.title: Gridmap Quickrace Test
scenarios.gridmap.gm_racetest.descriptio: A short series of small jumps.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_jumps.title: Jump Trial
scenarios.gridmap.gm_jumps.description: This trial sends you over a series of small jumps in an Ibishu Covet. The right speed makes all the difference.
scenarios.gridmap.hard_parking.title: Hard Parking
scenarios.gridmap.hard_parking.descripti: Parallel park as quickly as possible by sliding between two cars.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve1.title: Sky Curve 1
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve1.descripti: Drive a Hirochi Sunburst RS on Sky Curve!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_ds_offroad_shortcou: 3 sets of off-road challenges, can the Gavril D15 take it?
scenarios.gridmap.gm_ds_large_jumps.desc: Take an off-road spec Gavril H15 for one hell of a ride.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_suspension_race.des: This trial leads you back and forth over the 4 different suspension test patterns in a Gavril Roamer. It's a great way to ruin the alignment.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_intersection.title: Intersection
scenarios.gridmap.gm_intersection.descri: Calibrate your speed in the tunnel and try to hit the other car as it crosses the exit.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve2.title: Sky Curve 2
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve2.descripti: Drive a Civetta Bolide 390GTR on Sky Curve 2!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_intersection_2.desc: Calibrate your speed and try to hit the other car. This time with a twist!
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.gm_racetest.de: A short series of small jumps.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_drift: This scenario allows you to develop your drifting skills.
You call that drifting? Give it more speed and angle! Your Score:
Great job! You painted that skidpad with rubber! Your Score:
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_hairp: This will teach you how to corner quickly through a tight hairpin corner.
You are not in the brake area
Your handbrake turn wasn't flamboyant enough
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_accel: This will teach you the basics of accelerating and braking.
You are not in the brake area
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_corne: This will teach you to enter corners at their correct speed.
Time's up! Try again with a bit more speed
You hit a barrier! Next time try to brake earlier to maintain control through the corner
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_slalo: This course will test your front-wheel drive handling skills.
Time's up! Try again with a bit more speed
You hit a cone! Try to maintain a consistent speed and steer smoothly
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_advan: This scenario will teach threshold braking and decreasing radius corners.
Time's up! Try again with a bit more speed
You hit a cone! Next time try to stop the wheels from locking by carefully applying brake pressure
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_RWD_h: This will teach you how to drive a rear-wheel drive car at its limits without losing control.
Time's up! Try again with a bit more speed
You hit a cone! Try again and take care to avoid them
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_corne: This will teach you how to use a racing line for more efficient driving.
You are not in the brake area
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.dialog_test.de: Altered Training Part 2 to do a proof of concept for dialogs.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.intro_shortcir: The smaller configuration of Hirochi Raceway.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.ai_race.title: AI Race Test
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.forgotten_race: A race around a very old and overgrown part of Hirochi Raceway.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_spin_: This will train you to prevent a rear-wheel drive car from spinning out.
Time's up! Try again with a bit more speed
You left the recovery area! Next time try to anticipate the motion of the car to avoid losing control
scenarios.Industrial.pessima_autocross.d: Try out the Ibishu Pessima ZX with All-Wheel Steering. You'll be taking it through a handling course that requires great maneuverability.
scenarios.Industrial.autocrosstest.title: Autocross Test
scenarios.Industrial.industrial_jump_lar: Take an Ibishu Covet rally car on a flying journey over a series of raised platforms.
scenarios.Industrial.industrial_long_jum: Drove an Ibishu Covet rally car for 2 laps of a course featuring some long distance jumps.
scenarios.Industrial.industrial_allycros: Navigate the boaty Bruckell Moonhawk for 3 laps of a rallycross course.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_pessima: Race around the coast of Jungle Rock Island in the Ibishu Pessima Custom.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_ds_320_: Take the Civetta Bolide 320 where it was never meant to go.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_m: A race over the volcano on Jungle Rock Island.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_rally_p: Tough dirt rally ending at the port.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_r: A race around the entire island.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.drag_race.d: Enter a drag race on an abandoned air strip with your Gavril Barstow drag car. To win, you will have to shift on your own and time your start precisely.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_deliver: Deliver a new Gavril T75 Cement Mixer to the local port.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_shortcu: Thrash your Gavril Grand Marshal up a muddy washout between roads, then turn around and come back. Remember, it's only a shortcut if you survive it.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.hypermiling: Get to the airstrip with only a drop of fuel left in the tank. Can you make it in the highly efficient Ibishu Pessima HX?
You got stuck or ran out of fuel
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_portsha: Take a heavily modified Sunburst through a wild time trial at the abandoned port. Get that car rotating around the obstacles for the best time.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_chase.d: Chase down a fleeing Gavril H15 using your trusty old Ibishu Covet.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_drown_t: Help the defenseless little yellow Ibishu Pigeon survive through multiple puddles of water.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.d: A classic emergency lane change test, made to showcase a vehicle's handling stability. For this test you'll be using a Hirochi Sunburst RS
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.s: Too slow, you didn't enter at 85km/h or higher
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.t: Too slow, you used more than {{timeLimit}} seconds to get to the checkpoint
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_h: A hillclimb up the volcano on the island.
scenarios.port.port_container_race.title: Port Container Trial
scenarios.port.port_container_race.descr: Make it through a tricky course on top of shipping containers. This off-road spec Gavril D15 has just enough turning radius if you plan your moves correctly.
scenarios.port.port_escape.title: Port Escape
scenarios.port.port_escape.description: An escape-themed time trial through the port in an Ibishu Pessima.
scenarios.small_island.cop_chase.title: Small Island Chase
scenarios.small_island.cop_chase.descrip: Neutralize the Pessima with your Sunburst police car.
scenarios.small_island.hopping_around.de: Drive cross country from checkpoint to checkpoint in an Ibishu Hopper Custom.
scenarios.small_island.intro_rally_stage: A point to point rally stage.
A point to point rally stage.
Find your own way to an abandoned structure, then to the top of the mountain. Play it safe by taking the roads, or go cross country for a shorter path. You'll be driving a Gavril Roamer.
scenarios.small_island.intro_round_circu: Drive the Ibishu 200BX LS around the island loop course as fast as you can.
scenarios.utah.canyon_race.title: Canyon Race
scenarios.utah.canyon_race.description: A long run around the canyons and lowlands of Utah
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.title: Canyon Jump
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.description: Land some massive jumps across the unique geological formations of Utah. You'll be behind the wheel of an off-road spec Gavril H15.
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.fail.msg: You did not complete all the jumps
scenarios.utah.downhill_rally.title: Downhill Rally
scenarios.utah.downhill_rally.descriptio: Try out the ETK-I rally car on a mixed stage across Utah.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_bridg: Attempt to drive across a rickety bridge during a dust storm.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_canno: Use a powerful old cannon to destroy an old rusty car.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_cliff: Get to the bottom of the cliff the fast way.
You have not left the top area in within  {{failureTime}} seconds!
You dropped only {{altitude}} m and need at least 30m
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_crawl: Climb to the top of the hill, crossing a series of difficult obstacles.
You didn't complete at least one stage
A difficult drag race against a powerful yet poorly maintained muscle car.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_highw: Pass by a blockade in the road.
You need to pass the roadblock
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_hilld: Take a semi truck down a hill and as far through the canyon as you can in 20 seconds.
Launch your car off a large jump and try to flatten the target.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_ramcl: Ram an old car off the top of a cliff and get to the bottom.
The vehicle was not pushed off the cliff.
You didn't get both vehicles down the hill
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_rubbe: Rubberband - stats: damage taken, time taken, how far across the river you made it, score: how far across the river you made it, failure: not activating rubber band, not reaching first waypoint, Notes: need a button that activates a rubber band effect that connects your car to the side of the road for the duration you hold the button, by activating this it will fling you across the river
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_suspe: Race across some difficult terrain and put the suspension to the test.
You failed to complete the course
You failed to complete the course
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_wallj: Jump across a gap and through a brick wall.
You failed to hit the wall
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_1_ram: Dispose of the Covet by pushing it off a cliff.
Whoa! You okay there? You're not supposed to fall off yourself, be careful!
You're supposed to knock the Covet off the cliff. It's not that hard!
Nicely done! It's definitely scrap now
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_2_mix: A race against an opponent across varied terrain.
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_3_cra: Race across uneven surfaces. Can you make it to the finish line?
All bark and no bite. Come back when you've learned how to drive
You beat him yet again! Congratulations!
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_4_del: Help deliver parts to a location for a friend.
Thanks for delivering the parts. Now I can finally get moving
These parts really need to be delivered!
I appreciate the effort, but maybe try not to trash the cargo?
Drive close in reverse to the trailer
You can press [action=couplersToggle] to attach and detach the trailer
Attach the trailer to the vehicle using  [action=couplersToggle]
There are multiple routes. Find the one you like most!
You can use [action=decrease_zoom] to zoom out and [action=increase_zoom] to zoom back in
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_5_rol: Travel as far as you can with only steering - no brakes, no engine.
I'm sure you can do better than that
You've done well to get this far
scenarios.utah.chapter_2.chapter_2_6_can: A tough race through narrow canyon passes.
Congratulations! It was a tough race, but you made it!
Are you really gonna let him get away with that?
scenarios.utah.climbing_utah.title: Climbing Utah
scenarios.utah.climbing_utah.description: Crawl through a difficult path to reach the top of the cliff. You'll be at the wheel of a very capable Ibishu Hopper.
scenarios.utah.guineapig.title: Guinea Pig Preparations
scenarios.utah.guineapig.description: Transport a scrap car to the top of a cliff in preparation for an upcoming stunt. Take the Ibishu Hopper, it has the towing capacity.
scenarios.utah.guineapig.nocargo.msg: You didn't deliver the cargo to its destination
scenarios.utah.guineapig.cargoFellOff.fa: The Covet fell off the trailer
quickrace.east_coast_usa.dirt_race.title: Deforest Stage
quickrace.east_coast_usa.dirt_race.descr: A short dirt stage in the deforested area of the map. Watch out for fallen trees and stumps on the roadside.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.high_speed_high: A loop made of straight road sections allowing for very high speeds. Brake heavily before the corners to avoid flying off the road.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.offroad.title: Off-Road Trail 1
quickrace.east_coast_usa.offroad.descrip: A narrow trail through dirt, gravel, rocks and boulders. A good place to take a vehicle with four wheel drive and decent ground clearance.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.roadrace1.title: Asphalt Stage 1
quickrace.east_coast_usa.roadrace1.descr: An asphalt stage on countryside roads of on east coast of the United States. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.roadrace2.title: Asphalt Stage 2
quickrace.east_coast_usa.roadrace2.descr: An asphalt stage on countryside roads of on east coast of the United States. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.town_a.title: Street Stage 1
quickrace.east_coast_usa.town_a.descript: A short street stage winding through the town. The stage contains sharp corners and shortcuts over the pavement.
quickrace.east_coast_usa.town_b.title: Street Course 1
quickrace.east_coast_usa.town_b.descript: A short street course winding through the town. Be sure to not hit the traffic barrels!
quickrace.east_coast_usa.rallycross.desc: A long course of mixed dirt and asphalt roads. Best choose a vehicle at home both surfaces.
quickrace.gridmap.skycurve1.title: Sky Curve 1
quickrace.gridmap.skycurve1.description: Drive on Sky Curve! This is the easy one.
quickrace.gridmap.skycurve2.title: Sky Curve 2
quickrace.gridmap.skycurve2.description: Drive on Sky Curve 2! This one is a bit harder.
quickrace.gridmap.jumps.title: Jump Trial
quickrace.gridmap.jumps.description: This trial sends you through a series of small jumps. The right speed makes all the difference.
quickrace.gridmap.offroad.title: Off-Road Trial
quickrace.gridmap.offroad.description: This small stage features 3 difficult terrain types. An ideal test for a vehicle with four wheel drive and decent ground clearance.
quickrace.gridmap.suspension.title: Suspension Trial
quickrace.gridmap.suspension.description: This small stage leads you back and forth over the 4 different suspension test patterns. It's a great way to ruin a cars alignment.
quickrace.gridmap.slalom.title: Slalom Trial
quickrace.gridmap.slalom.description: Weave back and forth between the blocks. Keep the speed steady and manage the cars balance with steering and throttle.
quickrace.gridmap.bigo.title: High Speed Ring
quickrace.gridmap.bigo.description: This ring has wide banked corners designed for top speed testing. Steer gently to avoid losing speed before the next straight.
quickrace.utah.mix_asphalt.title: Road Course 1
quickrace.utah.mix_asphalt.description: A course composed of of 2-lane highway and narrow asphalt backroads. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
quickrace.utah.canyon_race.title: Mixed Stage 1
quickrace.utah.canyon_race.description: This stage begins in narrow canyonside roads, then descends to a dirt section, with a final stretch on the highway.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_rally_p: A rough dirt stage through the overgrown jungles of the island, finishing in the abandoned port.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_hillcli: A rough asphalt road to the top of the mountain. Sharp turns and dangerous cliffs all around.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_road_ra: A long asphalt loop around the perimeter of the island. Faster and less technical than other routes on the island.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_dirt_ra: This stage covers faster dirt roads alongside the central mountain of the island.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_m: An asphalt stage up one side of the mountain and down the other.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_peninsu: This winding asphalt stage leads you around the big peninsula of the island.
quickrace.jungle_rock_island.jri_portsha: This wild time trial weaves in and around the abandoned port. Get that car rotating around the obstacles for the best time.
The shorter configuration of the Hirochi Raceway. More suitable for lower powered vehicles.
quickrace.hirochi_raceway.fullcircuit1.d: The longer configuration of the Hirochi Raceway. More suitable for higher powered vehicles.
quickrace.hirochi_raceway.forgotten_race: A Race through the old, unmaintained part of the Hirochi Raceway. In the abandoned sections there are no barriers or sand traps, just encroaching forest.
quickrace.industrial.track_rc_eight.desc: A gravel and asphalt figure eight layout.
quickrace.industrial.track_rc_sprint.des: A longer gravel and asphalt layout.
A gravel and asphalt layout following the perimeter.
quickrace.industrial.track_rc_west.title: West Mixed Circuit
quickrace.industrial.track_rc_west.descr: A layout using only the asphalt section of the Mixed Circuit.
quickrace.industrial.track_rc_short.desc: A short gravel and asphalt layout.
quickrace.industrial.track_rt_west.title: West Race Circuit
quickrace.industrial.track_rt_west.descr: A layout on the west portion.
A faster layout following the perimeter.
quickrace.industrial.track_rt_long.title: Long Race Circuit
quickrace.industrial.track_rt_long.descr: The longest layout, incorporates the inner circuit.
quickrace.industrial.track_rt_curves.des: Like the perimeter circuit but incorporates the chicane.
The fastest layout in the industrial area.
quickrace.industrial.track_ri_sprint.des: A short, winding layout in the industrial area.
quickrace.industrial.track_ri_eight.desc: A figure eight layout in the old industrial area.
quickrace.industrial.track_ri_long.title: Long Industrial Course
quickrace.industrial.track_ri_long.descr: The longest layout in the industrial area.
quickrace.small_island.rally1.title: Mixed Stage 1
quickrace.small_island.rally1.descriptio: This short stage runs over unmaintained asphalt and gravel roads.
quickrace.small_island.rally2.title: Mixed Stage 2
quickrace.small_island.rally2.descriptio: This longer stage runs over asphalt, gravel, and some beach sand.
quickrace.small_island.rally3.title: Mixed Stage 3
quickrace.small_island.rally3.descriptio: This very long stage challenges with narrow dirt roads over the rocky center of the island.
quickrace.small_island.intro_round_circu: An alternative route around the island.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.bigB: Creates a procedurally generated stage that is large and contains available track elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.bigS: Creates a procedurally generated stage that is large and contains fewer but larger elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.tape: Creates a procedurally generated circuit, resembling a tape recorder with two big circular elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.rand: Creates a procedurally generated track, fully randomized. Most parameters set to a random value, this will create a wacky, sometimes self-intersecting track. Due to the randomness, some seeds might create faulty tracks.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.long: Creates a procedurally generated stage that is long, narrow, and packed with many small sized elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.medi: Creates a procedurally generated stage that is medium sized and contains all available track elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.smal: Creates a procedurally generated stage that is small and contains all available track elements.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.squa: Creates a procedurally generated, almost square circuit.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.wide: Creates a procedurally generated circuit featuring a long straight connected through gates.
quickrace.driver_training.procTrack.wind: Creates a procedurally generated, winding stage.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.rally_track.des: This figure eight dirt track features multiple jumps, rough terrain and uneven ground.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.drifttrack.desc: A small, even track located on a parking lot within the big race track.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.race_track.desc: The big race track just outside the city.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.race_track_shor: The big race track just outside the city, short version.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.drag_race.title: Drag Strip
quickrace.west_coast_usa.drag_race.descr: How quickly can you clear a quarter mile (400m)?
quickrace.west_coast_usa.mountain_race.d: Drive on the mountain roads of West Coast USA
quickrace.west_coast_usa.cell_tower.desc: Drive from one cell tower to the other. Make sure that you don't fall off the hills!
quickrace.west_coast_usa.city_race_1.des: Narrow curves and steep slopes lead you on a race through the city.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.city_race_2.des: Drive along the water on this race through the city and the harbor.
quickrace.west_coast_usa.highway_race.de: Reach top speed on this one mile long highway strip!
campaigns.utah.chapter_1.title: Senseless Destruction
campaigns.utah.chapter_1.description: Part 1: A montage of destruction across Utah
campaigns.utah.chapter_1.summaryMessage: You completed the first chapter, here you can view your performance compared to other players in the community
campaigns.utah.chapter_1.cliffjump.title: Cliff jump

scenarios.utah.cinematic_chase.descripti: A high speed battle in the desert between two modern ETK luxury cars.
campaigns.training.training.title: Driver's Training
campaigns.training.training.description: Get started by learning the essentials of driving in BeamNG.drive.
levels.autotest.info.title: automated testing
levels.cardealer.info.title: Car Dealership
levels.cardealer.info.description: A car dealership on the east coast of the United States.
levels.Cliff.info.title: Cliff
levels.Cliff.info.description: A massive mountain protruding from the ocean. Push a car off the top and see how far it will fall, and how much it will fall apart.
levels.derby.info.title: Derby Arenas
levels.derby.info.description: A wintery environment containing a number of arenas for demolition derbies.
levels.driver_training.info.title: ETK Driver Experience Center
levels.driver_training.info.description: A modern driver training facility located in Germany.
levels.driver_training.features: Skidpads, Circular track, Vehicle test areas
levels.dry_rock_island.info.title: Dry Rock Island
levels.dry_rock_island.info.description: *To be deprecated and replaced with the updated version, Jungle Rock Island, when complete* A long abandoned industrial island.
levels.dry_rock_island.info.roads: 40% asphalt, 30% dirt road, 30% trails and industrial roads
levels.dry_rock_island.info.features: industrial site, port, dirt cliff roads
levels.east_coast_usa.info.title: East Coast, USA
levels.east_coast_usa.info.description: A snapshot of the east coast of the USA. Based heavily on Maine and New Hampshire.
levels.east_coast_usa.info.suitablefor: Time Trials, Cruising, Exploration, Delivery, Chases
levels.east_coast_usa.info.features: Small town, Bridges, Rivers, Sawmill, Deforested area, Old houses
levels.west_coast_usa.info.title: West Coast, USA
levels.west_coast_usa.info.description: Explore the west coast of the USA. Representative of various locations in California.
levels.west_coast_usa.info.features: Belasco City, Racing Complex, Redwood Forest, Suburbs, Highways, River Channel, Dockyards
levels.Gridmap.info.title: Gridmap
levels.Gridmap.info.description: A virtual reality test terrain with a number of obstacles, stunt ramps, and test patterns
levels.Gridmap.info.roads: Some short dirt roads and trails
levels.Gridmap.info.features: High speed ring, Stunt objects, Suspension test objects, Crash test objects
levels.groundmodeltest.info.title: Groundmodel Test Area
levels.hirochi_raceway.info.title: Hirochi Raceway
levels.hirochi_raceway.info.description: Hirochi Raceway is a historic but revitalized track located on the east coast of the USA.
levels.hirochi_raceway.info.suitablefor: Racing, Drifting, Time Trials, Driver Training
levels.hirochi_raceway.info.features: Road course complex with multiple layouts, Abandoned track sections
levels.industrial.info.title: Industrial Site
levels.industrial.info.description: A coastal area featuring an industrial area, several small race tracks, and fields to roam in.
levels.industrial.info.suitablefor: Time Trials, Racing, Drifting, Demolition Derby
levels.industrial.info.features: Small race tracks with various surfaces, Industrial area
levels.italy.info.title: Italy
levels.italy.info.description: A small Italian island with beautiful coastline, villages, and vineyards.
levels.italy.info.suitablefor: Time Trials, Cruising, Exploration, Delivery, Chases
levels.italy.info.features: City, Villages, Port, Highway, Vineyards, Dam, Airport
levels.jungle_rock_island.info.title: Jungle Rock Island
levels.jungle_rock_island.info.descripti: This tropical island in the Pacific is dense with foliage but also with roads and trails to explore.
levels.jungle_rock_island.info.suitablef: Time Trials, Hillclimb, Cruising, Exploration, Delivery, Chases
levels.jungle_rock_island.info.features: Industrial site, Port, Dormant volcano, Lighthouse, Observatory
levels.menu.info.title: Menu
levels.menu.info.description: Old outdated menu screen, should be deleted
levels.port.info.title: Port
levels.port.info.description: This industrial port seems to have been abandoned, making a great place to slide around and make some tire smoke.
levels.small_island.info.title: Small Island, USA
levels.small_island.info.description: This small island off the east coast of the USA has little infrastructure, but it does have a very fun coastal loop road and lots of open terrain to explore!
levels.small_island.info.features: Perimeter loop road, Small mountain, Fields, Industrial area, Sandy beaches
levels.smallgrid.info.title: Grid, Small, Pure
levels.smallgrid.info.description: Empty grid as far as the eye can see.

levels.smallgrid_lightstest.info.title: Grid, Small, Lights Test
levels.smallgrid_soundtest.info.title: Smallgrid Sound Test
levels.smallgrid_soundtest.info.descript: Empty grid as far as the eye can see
levels.smallgrid_tiretest.info.title: Tire test grid

levels.the_void.info.title: The Void
levels.utah.info.title: Utah, USA
levels.utah.info.description: The canyons of Utah make for a vehicular paradise. Race on the well maintained asphalt roads, get dusty rallying off-road, or try to climb the canyon rocks.
levels.utah.info.suitablefor: Rock Crawling, Exploration, Cruising, Time Trials, Delivery, Chases
levels.utah.info.features: Canyons, Cliffs, Highway, Large tunnel, Abandoned industrial, Broken bridge
levels.utah_offroad_park.info.title: Utah Offroad Park - test
